for_sales.sales_text:
Early Bill Baily built GRP Lune whammel, with a Gunter sloop rig from a Drascombe Lugger, an 18 feet boat.

Douglas fir 16 feet heavy mast, gunter spar, loose footed mainsail, short bowsprit, new halyard for mainsail, new standing rigging, long shallow keel 19 inches aft, painted GRP hull, foredeck with washboards, just had a refit, sound GRP hull, ply floorboards, large barn door style rudder with long wooden tiller, new bung in keel, outboard well.

Mariner 2022 3.5 hp outboard, as new.

French break-back, braked trailer purchased in October 2022 for £3000.

Can deliver in UK for fuel & expenses.

boat.full_description: Early Bill Baily built GRP Lune whammel, with a Gunter sloop rig from a Drascombe Lugger an 18 feet boat. Douglas fir 16 feet heavy mast, gunter spar, loose-footed main sail, short bowsprit, long shallow keel 19 inches aft, painted GRP hull, foredeck with washboards.
boat.name: AUK
